feed.title: Inherited IDs - A safer, more powerful alternative to BIP-118 (ANYPREVOUT) for scaling Bitcoin

entry.title: Inherited IDs - A safer, more powerful alternative to BIP-118 (ANYPREVOUT) for scaling Bitcoin
entry.summary: John has informed that he has posted some responses in his Github repository regarding btc-iids. It is suggested to respond to him through Github issue or similar platforms. The link to his Github repo is https://github.com/JohnLaw2/btc-iids.
